website_summaries.verdict: A natural hair regrowth shampoo that will leave your hair looking fuller and healthier.
pros: Natural shampoo that stimulates hair regrowth
Tea tree oil moisturizes the scalp
Also eliminates dandruff and split ends
Essential oils add moisture and shine
cons: Some say that it dries out their hair

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought this product it was for the ketoconazole ingredient. It smelled great and my hair was dandruff free.... I bought it again and they removed this and other ingredients and didn't even change the product name. You can't do that to your consumers!! Never buying again
customer_reviews.author: Hack

customer_reviews.title: "New formula" just removes ketoconazole
customer_reviews.text: I liked this as an alternative to Nizoral, just reordered it expecting the same product but it's not. Now it's just another natural hair shampoo. What a waste of a previously good and unique product.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence LeBoeuf

customer_reviews.title: After trying Nioxin, Revita and Wick & Strom I ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying Nioxin, Revita and Wick & Strom I was about to give on hair loss shampoos. However, L'emarie seems to be working for me. It hasn't eliminated the thinning spots but I have more hair growing in those spots than before. This is the first shampoo I've tried with 1% ketoconazole. I'm not sure if that's the difference or if any of the other ingredients matter as well. EDIT: As other more recent reviews have indicated, the "new formula" no longer contains ketoconazole.
customer_reviews.author: Don McFall

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo/ condition combo
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo/ condition combo. My hair was stronger and grew quicker. I had less shedding. The smell was great. My scalp felt invigorated. Just do not get near your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to have ketoconazole, now it's gone
customer_reviews.text: Why would they take out the only ingredient clinically shown to treat hair-loss?? I'm sure the other ingredients are helpful, but ketoconazole is the major player and it's been removed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Murray

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo works very well, however the condition IS AWFUL! The conditioner odor in intense and made both me and my husband sick! Cannot use. Buy the shampoo only. I used a different conditioner and my hair and scalp in repair and reducing hair loss. Would like 1/2 the cost to be reimbursed due to the conditioner is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ortagus

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to try it out for a month and till now I have just been disappointed. I wish I could return it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it will help me with my hair fall, instead, it increased it. I wanted to try it out for a month and till now I have just been disappointed. I wish I could return it, as more than half of the bottle is still there and now I do not know what to do with it, but to throw it away. I hope this suits others because it did nothing for me. The only good thing was the conditioner made my hair very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Arunima Dey

customer_reviews.title: Completely Stops Hair Loss
customer_reviews.text: One of the tricks to minimizing hair loss is to wash it every day. My dad and brother didn't, and they're as bald as can be. Not me! Still, using regular shampoo was beginning to stop working, so I switched to this. Bottom line...this shampoo is excellent! Stopped my hair loss and some even grew back. Very concentrated, so it lasts much longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald R.

customer_reviews.title: Baby hairs Ahoy
customer_reviews.text: After using this shampoo for a couple of weeks,I started to notice little sprouts of hair forming at my hairline. So far I am impressed. The shampoo also works well as shampoo and makes my scalp tingle and my hair clean. See attached photo for new baby hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Dubbs

customer_reviews.title: Has helped with hairloss. Finally a solution!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It has stopped my hair loss through continued daily use over the last month with what seems to be some hairs even growing back. So far I have only gone through about 1/3 of the bottle as well, so I expect this to last roughly 3 months. I have also noticed much less dandruff, even entering the dryer winter months where I live here in the mountain west.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: iffy
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it enough to see all the benefits it claims, it is however, VERY drying. I have thin hair and this really is hard on it. The conditioner has to be supplemented as on it's own it doesn't add the moisture stripped by the shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Lovely consistency
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Lovely consistency! Smells good! Has all the Goode essential oils all in one product! I will keep this product on hand! Works!!! My husbands hair stopped falling and is growing back! Awesome!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly1974

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my extreme Dandruff and associated hairfall
customer_reviews.text: 4stars only bc sodium lauryl sulfate Not sure about hair thinning i started finasteride same time I started shampoo But it helped with hair fall from extreme dandruff Was battling extreme dandruff and associated hair fall prior to this treatment with head and shoulders - didn't work About 2+ weeks into this shampoo and dandruff is completely gone no flakes no snow when I touch it Also no more excessive hair fall Hair is still thin but only a couple weeks in
customer_reviews.author: Logic

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair Loss Shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for a little over a month now and I am IMPRESSED! I've been losing a lot of hair since having my son 3 years ago. I've tried many different shampoos but nothing worked until I randomly found L'emarie Hair Growth & Hair Loss Shampoo on Amazon. The first time when I used this shampoo, the amount of hair that fell out was reduced to 80%. My bf and I thought it was just a coincidence but so far it has been very consistent. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure on this shampoo. I will say the first few weeks I was loving it. I thought it was working really well. Then, about a month in from using it my hair started falling out BAD. I am not sure if it was this shampoo or not. I didn't change anything else up. I switched to nioxin and my hair has decreased in shedding a lot. I will probably not be repurchasing this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Cats meow

customer_reviews.title: I've used another popular brand of shampoo to prevent hair loss and I found that it didn't get sudsy and it took a lot to feel l
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be working. I've used another popular brand of shampoo to prevent hair loss and I found that it didn't get sudsy and it took a lot to feel like my hair was being cleaned. However, this shampoo lathers much better, has a nice scent and my hair feels softer than when using the other shampoo (Pura D'or). I've been using this for just about 1 month and have noticeably less hair in the drain after my shower. I'm glad I gave this one a try, will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: no better than any other "thickening" shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy again, no better than any other "thickening" shampoo. Did love the smell though. That is the only thing I liked.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Didnt Care for This
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo did not stop or make any new hair grow. It also separates and gets a strong odor. Its like the shampoo breaks down - to who knows what. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Bad Person

customer_reviews.title: Wow - wonderful surprise
customer_reviews.text: To early to tell if it will stop hair from falling/thinning - but it feels great, don’t need a lot ( good b/c it is expensive) smells great and leaves hair very nice feeling. I will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Shedding did not decrease and no new hair growth
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved this shampoo to work for me. Hair loss runs in my family so I was looking for a dht blocking ketoconazole shampoo. I gave it a good 6-8 weeks but it unfortunately did nothing for me. I still notice increased shedding and no new hair growth whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: pineapple books

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful health shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy shampoo with rich suds. Small bottle but it provides many hair washings.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: Used to have Ketoconazole a 1% and was an effective shampoo but now it's 100% worthless. Scammers at L'emaire were tired of paying for Ketoconazole so they're increasing their profits by screwing over their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well
customer_reviews.text: It is a very useful product for my friend, it helped with dandruff and hair loss, it boosted their confidence quite a bit after using this for a while. Plus I do feel like the extra vitamins help with tiredness and unhealthy ingredients in other shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: The Wassons

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks now ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it for a couple of weeks now. It worked the first time getting rid of dandruff but ever since then, it just dries my scalp out more.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Can't speak to it's effectiveness for hair loss - but for dandruff it's worked like nothing else for me
customer_reviews.text: I had a boyfriend who used this for this thinning hair. The boyfriend went, but the shampoo stayed. I do not have thinning hair or hair loss. I use this product because it is the only product I have ever used that has completely treated my dandruff. It does not make my hair more oily, it doesn't do anything other can stop the flakes and itch. The large bottle lasts about a year when used as instructed. Can't speak to it's effectiveness for hair loss - but for dandruff it's worked like nothing else for me.
customer_reviews.author: lawstudentj

customer_reviews.title: This shampoo and conditioner area great! Really enjoyed it while I used it
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner area great! Really enjoyed it while I used it. It really did improve the thickness and softness of my hair and helped my scalp too. It lasts - you don't need much to wash or condition. Unfortunately, having to cut spending a bit and can't purchase it again right now. But I will when I can afford it again!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Dickason

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: It's been a month since I m using this. I used twice a week. My dandruff is now under control. Where as my fair fall is still the same. I haven't seen any changes. Hair getting thin and hair fall both remain the same without seeing any improvement. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: Jehanzaib Ch

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but use conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I really think this product wored well for hair growth. However, I definitely need a conditioner with it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth O. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: It helped me from losing anymore hair, I can wear black shirts again without anymore annoying dandruff on my shoulders!
customer_reviews.author: Miriam Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't break my scalp out, which is very rare ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't break my scalp out, which is very rare, as I'm allergic to almost anything. I do have to alternate its use as it leaves my hair just a pinch oily.
customer_reviews.author: ClaytonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: I really like this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shampoo. It only takes a small amount to lather a lot. My hair feels and looks better after I use it. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Venable

customer_reviews.title: Helps.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this product. It stopped hair loss and thicken the hairs. I am going to order another shampoo for her. She is saying really high of it. She recommended this product to her friend too.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Kills rignworm, happy wife, happy life.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shampoo bar none. Wife spends a billion dollars at the dematologist on red spots without conclusion but I find this on the net and it cured the fungus related dermatitis. If you have animals and red spots then you probably have ringworm which this will get rid of.
customer_reviews.author: alphonse

customer_reviews.title: The product gives me hope for my condition of thinning hair
customer_reviews.text: I like the product as it does make my hair condition much better.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Little to no hair fall
customer_reviews.text: Whenever 'I'm done in the shower, i vigorously dry my hair with a towel and look on the shower floor for hair fall, and I must say, there is little to none each time i check after using this shampoo. There is also less hair fall noticed during the day, and seemingly less dandruff. It's not the greatest shampoo otherwise, as it doesn't lather a lot, especially for the high price, but just based on the reduced hair fall, it gets 5 stars and i will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: wont grow hair back !!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WILL NOT GROW YOUR HAIR BACK- IT IS GENETICS - NO SHAMPOO WILL HELP YOU.
customer_reviews.author: cory k. cotton

customer_reviews.title: Same result at lower price...
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this a few weeks ago to see if it would be as effective as Nizoral for less money. It has worked great so far. No issues with lathering, and I live in "hard water" area. I took the advice of another reviewer, and I shampoo with a regular shampoo first then use this. Will be purchasing again, especially since it seems the Nizoral 1% OTC may be discontinued indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey G Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Must try product
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair stop itching and got rid of the dandruff that had been plaguing me for a year. My hair is growing probably about 3 inches in the past two months. My hair seems healthier and less frizzy. This is the only thing I changed in my hair routine so it has to be this shampoo. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: NJThriving

customer_reviews.title: Adds fullness
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo! My hair is thinning so I tried it. Makes my hair soft, and full, and looking much better.
customer_reviews.author: jan b

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair dry, causing lots of breakage. ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair dry, causing lots of breakage. I will not purchase this again or use the remainder of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff out there!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I have tried so many different shampoos and conditioners. Nothing has worked. This stuff works! It took about 4 months to see the shedding to stop. FYI: eat a healthy diet, no junk, high protein, takes good vitamins and DO NOT DRINK DIET SODAS. Your hair will stop falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: My wife has psoriasis on her scalp, so we grabbed this to give it a shot. She uses it about once a week now and has no issues.
customer_reviews.author: LBrown

customer_reviews.title: This works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great, whatever is wrong with your scalp that lead you to this product.... it will fix it. Have recommended to countless people since purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Kay E. Newman

customer_reviews.title: L'emarie hair Growth Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I just received this two days ago and only used it once. I brought this for hair loss.
customer_reviews.author: donald dacy

customer_reviews.title: African American with seborrheic dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: Great for African American's with seborrheic dermatitis greqt results with this shampoo
customer_reviews.author: A.T

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but I will keep buying!
customer_reviews.text: YES!!!!!!! Finally I am replacing my long term use of Head and Shoulders with a product that keeps my scalp healthy but DOESN'T make my hair brittle. Love this shampoo!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lepetitechef

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had issues with my scalp itchiung and flaking, tried Neutrogena T/Sal and other schampoos - this one is the first that actually helps. Love the peppermint scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tome C.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Definitely helps itchy, but it's drying to scalp AND skin.
customer_reviews.author: MKelley

customer_reviews.title: Burning Scalp.... NO MORE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth Every Penny!!! I have had an issue with a burning scalp for about 2 years now. everything I tried wouldn't tame the burning. I am happy to say that my head is no longer red and burning for hours after i shower.
customer_reviews.author: mike hovey

customer_reviews.title: you pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: this product is unbelievable. it works wonders and magic. your scalp and hair will thank you later. thanks so much The E Beauty Store. you have a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product twice now, and am very pleased with the results. I've had noticeably less hair loss after shampooing, and hopefully that will continue. As with other reviewers, I find this product good for my hair and very moisturizing. I am only giving 4 stars at this point because I have only used the shampoo twice; if all continues to go as well after several more uses, I will definitely update to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but effective
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this as a dandruff shampoo instead of Nizoral, which is usually very difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works! None of the ones in the ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! None of the ones in the drug store work, but this DOES! No residue, and not too much drying (which I have noticed with prescription products).
customer_reviews.author: BPlows

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my sister, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: The product did clean my hair well, but it did not relieve any of the itching. The dandruff was not as visible as in the past. My sister used the shampoo and loved it. I guess I'll just go back to the doc for a prescription. It was just more convenient to be able to pick up Nizoral OTC, but now that it's unavailable I'll have to go back to getting my prescriptions refilled.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not consistent with their product but the price is right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: L'emarie Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like the combination of herbs and oils and dandruff fighting medications. Great shampoo for all types of hair and hair styles.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Freeman

customer_reviews.title: So Far
customer_reviews.text: Hair loss and flaking seem to have lessened for me in only a week. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonee

customer_reviews.title: I had very bad seborrheic dermatitis before using this shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I had very bad seborrheic dermatitis before using this shampoo.My scalp was extremely itchy and flaky. I was looking for a way to treat it outside of the prescription shampoo because I didn't like those very much and they didn't work for me. This shampoo has been a blessing and completely restored the health of my scalp. Now that my scalp is healed I will continue to use it for the hair growth perks. I highly recommend you try this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shampoo/Decreases shedding
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shampoo for hair loss reasons. I've only used it a few times, so I will update this review in the future. So far, I love this shampoo - I have markedly less hair shedding. A lot less. It is remarkable. As far as hair growing in, it is too soon to tell. The smell is very pleasant - like a minty sent. I use 3 pumps of the dispenser and it lathers very nicely. I could probably just use 2 pumps. Update: never noticed any hair regrowth. Went back to Pur a dor and hair is growing back on my forehead/hairline.
customer_reviews.author: The Bad Person

customer_reviews.title: I love this shampoo and will order it again because it ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo and will order it again because it alleviates dry scalp and provides soft manageable hair. I am going to order this again when I run out because it is the bomb!
customer_reviews.author: Sharu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, still too soon to see if it’s working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Good
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only used it a couple of times and it makes your hair feel great. Will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Product good/Pump defective
customer_reviews.text: Product seems great! Unfortunately, I cant use it well because the pump is defective. When it arrived, about 1/4 of the product as in the bubble wrap around the bottle & the pump won't function. Too big of a mess to ship back. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: lorenjean

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well-made product and is easy to use. It seems to do the job and I will update as needed. Nice pump container and great pricing. I recommend, will buy again, and I hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: A Long-time Prime Person

customer_reviews.title: I have fungus on my scalp and was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have fungus on my scalp and was looking for something natural. I have used it a few times and have not seen much improvement.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Really clean feeling after using Lemarie
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a product for my thinning hair. I have a chronic scalp condition, partly due to sensitivity to some usual Ingredients in soaps. This soap makes my scalp feel so clean. No more itchy scalp. Plus, it just takes a drop or two to get a nice lather. Nice scent
customer_reviews.author: Kaydee

customer_reviews.title: but is really nice once achieved (although I couldn't imagine using this with ...
customer_reviews.text: I see less hair in the drain now when I shower. Lather takes work, but is really nice once achieved (although I couldn't imagine using this with very long hair). I love the cool feeling on my scalp, but have only experienced a mild improvement in dry scalp/itching. Overall I like it...just not overly amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but it isn't magical
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a week but I am noticing my hair falls less when shampooing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: Seems to last a couple days at most before I must use the product again. Nizoral seemed to last up to a week or more at times before I felt like my scalp needed treatment. Also, the shampoo doesn't lather as well and doesn't leave my hair manageable. IT IS THE BEST ALTERNATIVE to nizoral but I'm going to search out another product with the same anti-dandruff ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: dan j martinez

customer_reviews.title: Great product grat price
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this shampoo, my first wash and I can feel the difference and the relief I feel . I used other shampoo with Ketoconazole and decided to buy this one because of the combination with the Pyrithione Zinc .
customer_reviews.author: trevor roler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied. Product worked as described and right away! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Walker

customer_reviews.title: This product didn’t work for and I believe that anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work for and I believe that anyone who thinks about buying it should look at some other products first.
customer_reviews.author: noel martinez

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nizoral
customer_reviews.text: It works great and does not dry up your hair like Nizoral does. For those with oily hair like mine, use a regular shampoo first to wash up excess oil, then use a bit of this shampoo for it's effect on your scalp condition. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: N.S.

customer_reviews.title: Contains sulfates.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for dandruff control, not great for hair texture.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Godsend for Seborrheic Dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: This product is a godsend. I have seborrheic dermatitis and I struggled daily with itching, redness, and unsightly scales flaking off. After only a few days of using this shampoo it out my condition in remission! Not a flake in site! It even worked for the spots on my nose and behind my ears. So grateful for this product! I was worried it was a little pricey, but I'd gladly spend the money for the results I'm having!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help me
customer_reviews.text: After trying a lot of other shampoo products so far this is the best. Reduced itching, almost eliminated small sores, gradually changing forehead skin tone to normal, improving facial blushes that would get inflamed and itch, burn and look "angry." Ive almost through the first bottle of shampoo and have had significant improvement to my scalp, forehead and face.
customer_reviews.author: kalani

customer_reviews.title: Save your hair--and you money!
customer_reviews.text: Sodium l. sulfate (2X)--hard on hair; you're much better off without it. At least it's cheap to make (and the profit margin is therefore HUGE).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  It works.
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent shampoo! I purchased it more for an itchy scalp than for preventing hair loss. Together with the L'emarie Intensive Energizing Healthy Scalp & Hair Growth Anti Fall Treatment Ketoconazole Minoxidil Anti-fall DHT Blocking Prevention Anti-dandruff Biotin Saw Palmetto for Men and Women Dandruff Lotion Drops my itchy scalp has completely stopped itching. This is after a search that has cost thousands over many years. And yes, I hardly find any hair in the drain. Whether it grows hair or not I cannot tell after just a few weeks, but I am honestly happy with the shampoo as well as the lotion drops. AND I paid full price for both products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael QE

customer_reviews.title: On my way to new hair!
customer_reviews.text: Right away I noticed less scalp irritation and scabbing. I'm on my way to new hair growth! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C Reed

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: No more white flake,it work very good ,I would recommend it to people have the same trouble with the itchy flaky on hair

customer_reviews.title: All in one package, My scalp much needed pampering
customer_reviews.text: I used this product once so far and my scalp feel sooooooo refresh , I like the smell as well ,smell very natural.
customer_reviews.author: virgilia

customer_reviews.title: Very very very very Bed product.. never buy it..
customer_reviews.text: Very bad product. Never use it. No effect on my dandruff. It gettig increase after use of it. Please do not buy..
customer_reviews.author: Apar

customer_reviews.title: Scary
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say but it was a waste of money. I used it for a period of time. Would skip a few day in between uses. If used too frequently it would create irritation on my scalp. After a while I started to notice the product change color. It was becoming brown-orange just like the color of the bottle and beginning to smell like ammonia. There is something wrong with this product and I would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo R. Terry

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. It arrived on time and it's not drying my scalp like many shampoos do. I am not sure about its effectiveness yet as it has been only a week since I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: devarajen

customer_reviews.title: Very bad products for me,
customer_reviews.text: Hi All, We started using below products from last couple of weeks, please find my review comments below:-  After using Hair Growth Treatment Shampoo and Re-Energize Drops, it’s started itching and skin allergy on scalp.  So I stopped using this products, it’s seems these are not functioning as for description. Those are Very bad products for me, because these didn’t controlled dandruff
customer_reviews.author: Balaiah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: only have used it a little but i really like follow instructions
customer_reviews.author: Jan Gowen

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I took a chance on this product! Took 2-3 months to notice decrease in hair falling out. Pleased to say it works. Best suggestion is to lather shampoo and leave product on scalp for 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: lt1945

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my hair and scalp
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a few years now. I have tried many shampoos over the years, but this one has been the best match for my hair and scalp. My scalp has seemed healthier ever since I began using this product and I also like the way it leaves my hair (neither too oily nor too stripped of oil). I wish it were less expensive, but it works so well for me that I keep buying it. I never noticed any "intensive hair growth" as it states on the label, but that is not really why I buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Fan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for hair loss.
customer_reviews.text: Have had great big handfuls of hair falling out for nearly a year now. Had every test the doctors can think of and no help there. Started using this shampoo about 3 weeks ago and the hair loss has gone down to nearly nothing, so that part is great. I have not noticed any new growth, but it has only been 3 weeks. At this point, no new loss is a blessing. The shampoo lathers well, smells clean and leaves my hair feeling nice and soft. I also like the fact that you only use it every three days, as that is how often I used to shampoo. I got the conditioner too and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieTaft

customer_reviews.title: Great for senior hair treatment
customer_reviews.text: THis shampoo leaves your hair and scalp looking great, while feeling a clean and stimulating sensation. It seems to be having some effect on my thins spots filling in with fresh hair.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smythe

customer_reviews.title: Does not have ketoconazole
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the 1% ketoconazole. But there is none. It is useless to me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps with controlong itchy scalp almost as well as a very expensive prescription product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer m

customer_reviews.title: No more dermatitis
customer_reviews.text: Completely stopped my seborrheic dermatitis and itching. This is the only shampoo that has worked for me besides prescription shampoo with steroids. I only use it once a week and it still works great. I have 4C African American hair, so I always have to use a lot of product. I use this mainly on my roots and scalp and use a cheaper shampoo (Trader Joes tea tree tingle shampoo) on the rest of my hair to stretch it out. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: These products do exactly what they say. It moistures ...
customer_reviews.text: These products do exactly what they say. It moistures, thoroughly cleans and conditions the hair and is soothing to the scalp; not harsh at all. Before using it my hair was dry and my scalp irritated, but since I've had the pleasure of using L'emarie I have not looked back! You should try it!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for Ketoconazole shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I found this while I was looking for a replacement for Nizoral AD as it shares the active ingredient (ketoconazole) that I was looking for to tame my crazy dandruff. This stuff works just as well as Nizoral AD and has a pleasant scent. The one qualm I have with it is that it doesn't lather very well at all, so it does take more to properly apply than you'd first anticipate. This is the only reason I rated it 4 stars. This is also quite gentle on the face, so people who suffer from occasional seborrheic dermatitis or an overly itchy beard, this stuff works great there as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Loffelbein

customer_reviews.title: Too drying
customer_reviews.text: It didn't work for me at all. In fact, it made my hair very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Hair is noticeably healthier
customer_reviews.text: Hair is noticeably healthier. The first time I had my hair cut after using this shampoo for just under 2-weeks I was told my hair was healthier than she had ever seen it. No idea of other benefits yet (and thus the dropping of one star). Fyi. No problems with the pump.
customer_reviews.author: CAc4s

customer_reviews.title: Ketoconazole
customer_reviews.text: With Nizoral 1% unavailable right now I came to amazon for alternatives. The sellers are charging outrageous prices for Nizoral A/D so I didn't even bother. I tried the Nizoral 2% from overseas and I didn't like the way it left my hair feeling. I do like this shampoo as it does seem to work as it should but the consistency is thin and watery. With the pump bottle I find I'm using 6-8 pumps of shampoo to clean my scalp. It also doesn't lather well. The smell is overall pleasant and not to strong.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Lynch

customer_reviews.title: ... for years and this shampoo has giving me the best results ever
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from seborrheic dermatitis in my scalp for years and this shampoo has giving me the best results ever, I can wear black shirts now I don't have to worry about the white dust in my shoulders,it takes like two washes to start seeing results and it has a pleasant smell, and I would buy it again.a update I bought this shampoo in October and for the first time I have used all of it and order me a new one it's worth it .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Makes my scalp feel awake and alive again.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I have grown any more hair yet but when I use it it sure wakes up my scalp! I like how it makes the hair I have left feel to! I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

product_meta.title: L'emarie Hair Growth Shampoo, Anti-Dandruff Treatment With Biotin, Pea Peptide - Anti-Hair Loss, Thicker, Fuller, Healthier Hair for Men & Women -16oz
feature_bullets: STIMULATING HAIR GROWTH AND FIGHTING HAIR LOSS: Our Pisum Sativum (Pea) Peptide Under 2000 Daltons, Its clinical studies have shown a considerable increase in hair density unique natural ingredient to activate hair follicle dermal papilla cell (HFDPC) under your scalp. Stem cell booster can promote hair growth by stimulatory effects on follicle stem cell growth, migration, and differentiation.
HAIR GROWTH SHAMPOO FOR WOMEN & MEN: Promote hair growth and regrowth plus prevent hair loss.
UNIQUE HAIR GROWTH & SCALP FORMULA: This unique hair growth & hair loss shampoo contains ingredients to gently cleanse, protect and treat your hair and scalp.

Paraben & ketoconazole Free, MADE IN THE USA & CRUELTY FREE (Never tested on animals) SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Our goal is to offer the highest quality products. If you’re not 100% satisfied with the results of our product, we will provide a full refund.
PROFESSIONAL GRADE / PH 5.5 Balanced / HAIR GROWTH SHAMPOO FOR WOMEN & MEN: Promote hair growth and regrowth plus prevent hair loss with this intensive shampoo treatment.*
